segments.text: I can't believe how much water is on the floor, it's such a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she must be really tired or distracted to not notice the water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so naughty, sneaking cookies like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall if he stretches any further, that stool is so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the girl doesn't encourage him to do something dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're going to get in so much trouble if the woman catches them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the woman, she's going to have such a big cleanup job later.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is ruining the cabinets, and it's just going to keep getting worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would help her turn off the faucet and stop the water.
segments.speaker: PAR
